Entries.Sophia0: This is the start of something wonderful.$4
Entries.Sophia1: Um. Hey. I'll see you later, okay?$4

Entries.Utility.cs.5367: When @ first arrived in Pelican Town, no one knew if he'd fit in with our community...#$b#But from this day forward, @ is going to be as much a part of this town as any of us!$h#$b#It is my great honor on this day {0} of {1}, to unite @ and Sophia in the bonds of marriage.
Entries.Utility.cs.5369: When @ first arrived in Pelican Town, no one knew if she'd fit in with our community...#$b#But from this day forward, @ is going to be as much a part of this town as any of us!$h#$b#It is my great honor on this day {0} of {1}, to unite @ and Sophia in the bonds of marriage.
Entries.Utility.cs.5371: @... Sophia... #$b# As the mayor of Pelican Town, and regional bearer of the matrimonial seal, I now pronounce you husband and wife!$h
Entries.Utility.cs.5377: @... Sophia... #$b# As the mayor of Pelican Town, and regional bearer of the matrimonial seal, I now pronounce you wife and..., well, wife!$h

BeforeMovie.Text: I can't believe they made a Prairie King movie... I hope it's good!

AfterMovie.Text: The movie was so so great! Thanks for taking me!$1

BeforeMovie.Text: I hope this movie is good! I think there's a cute character in it!$1
Let's go get the good seats, @!$1
Hey, you! Thanks for inviting me, I love going to the movies.$1

AfterMovie.Text: There were some silly parts, but I liked it.$9

BeforeMovie.Text: I-I don't know about this one. I'm just here for the snacks.$1

AfterMovie.Text: I think I'd rate that a 5 out of 10.$0

Entries.Sophia: I get nervous around large crowds of people...$2
Hey, you! Want to get some food with me?$4#$e#I already had a plate. This will be my second.$9
I'm here for the free cake.$1
D-don't ask me to dance. I get nervous.$2#$e#Um. Want to eat a lot of food instead?$1
I added aged Blue Moon Wine for the adult pot!$9#$e#I hope the other ingredients people put in are tasty!$1
Want to go swimming after we eat?$1#$e#I have a new bikini.$4
The jellyfish are so pretty! I love watching them every year.#$e#I used to watch them wi-$1#$e#Oh. Um. Never mind.$2
Hey, you. See the faint glow out there?$1#$e#The moonlight jellyfish are coming to the shore!$9#$e#You hold Sophia's hand. She smiles at you.
I'm presenting my best aged wine from Blue Moon Vineyard!#$e#I worked hard to make these!$9#$e#Oh. Um. So what's in your grange display?$1
We are competing against each other today.$1#$b#May the best one win!$3#$e#Oh. Um. I love you!$4#$b#Good luck!$9
I went into the maze and gave up.$2#$e#Why? Oh. I was hungry.$1#$e#Have you tried Pierre's spiced pumpkin cider?$9
Hey, you. Getting food too?$1#$e#Hey! Um. Those monsters in the cages. Have you fought those before?$0#$e#You're so brave, my hero.$4
Mmm. So pretty here.$9#$e#There's no food, but that's okay. I brought snacks.$1
I want to build a snowman!$9#$b#Come on! Let's make one, silly.$1#$e#Aww. Okay. After the fishing contest then!$1
Who's a good boy!? You are!$9#$e#Did you get a present yet?$1
Hey, you! I thought I'd pet Dusty for a little bit.$1#$b#He's Pelican Town's best boy!$9#$e#Oh. Um. I'll join you at a table soon. Save me a seat?$1

I get startled easily.$1"/pause 1000/move Sophia 0 0 3/pause 800/move Sophia 0 0 2/pause 300/speak Sophia "Um. Hey. You're kinda new to farming so...$2"/pause 900/showFrame Sophia 32/pause 250/shake Sophia 600/pause 900/showFrame Sophia 0/pause 500/speak Sophia "Um. I want to give you a device.$1#$b#Follow me to my storage chest!$9"/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000 true/warp farmer 25 17/warp Sophia 23 17/faceDirection Sophia 0 true/faceDirection farmer 3 true/viewport 24 17 true/pause 1200/shake Sophia 500/playSound openChest/pause 1600/playSound pickUpItem/pause 1100/move Sophia 0 0 1/pause 600/move Sophia 1 0 1/speak Sophia "Here! It's a sprinkler![621]$1#$b#It'll automatically water adjacent crops every day.$1"/pause 300/playSound reward/message "You received a 'Quality Sprinkler'!"/pause 800/speak Sophia "Um. I have an order ledger in my cosplay room.$0#$b#If you need more, you can purchase sprinklers from me.$1"/pause 500/end dialogue Sophia "Oh. Um. Hello!$1#$b#How's the sprinkler? Does it still work?$0"

Is everything okay, boo?$2"/pause 500/shake Sophia 500/pause 900/speak Sophia "S-sorry. I-I'm just trailing off in thought...$2"/pause 400/warp farmer 0 39/speed farmer 1/move farmer 41 0 2 true/speak Scarlett "You said the doctor prescribed you new medicine?$0#$b#Is it helping with...?$2"/pause 1800/speak Sophia "Y-yeah. It helps...$2"/pause 750/showFrame Scarlett 0/pause 300/faceDirection Scarlett 1 true/pause 250/shake Scarlett 1000/speak Scarlett "Hey! You'll get through this. I'll visit you a hundred times if that's what it takes!$1"/pause 1200/speak Sophia "...$2#$b#...$0#$b#...$1"/pause 600/showFrame Sophia 0/pause 600/faceDirection Sophia 3 true/pause 350/speak Sophia "You always know how to cheer me up.$1"/pause 1300/move Sophia 0 0 0/pause 500/emote Sophia 8 true/pause 400/move Scarlett 0 0 0/pause 500/speak Scarlett "Who's that boy?$0^Who's that girl?$0"/pause 700/speak Sophia "Oh, um. That's @, the new farmer I told you about.$1"/pause 900/viewport move 0 -1 2250 true/move Scarlett 0 -2 1/move Scarlett 1 0 0/move Scarlett 0 -1 0/pause 700/move Sophia 0 -3 0 true/pause 200/speak Scarlett "Nice to meet you, @! I'm Scarlett, a friend of this dork.$1#$b#Gettin' into the farming business? It's tough work.$0#$b#I live in Grampleton with my papa. He's over at Marnie's with the truck loading up a bunch of milk and wool.$1"/pause 300/speak Sophia "We met during a cosplay meetup.$9#$b#Grampleton is kinda far away. I really appreciate it when she visits.$1"/pause 700/move Scarlett 0 0 1/pause 500/speak Scarlett "Shoot. I should run back. He's probably just about done by now.$2"/pause 350/faceDirection Sophia 3/pause 100/speak Sophia "Aww, okay.$2#$b#Text me later?$1"/speak Scarlett "For sure! I'll send you something funny!$1"/pause 800/move Scarlett 0 0 0/pause 400/speak Scarlett "It was nice meeting you, @.$0"/pause 400/move Scarlett 0 0 1/pause 200/speak Scarlett "Bye, boo.$1"/pause 400/speak Sophia "Bye, you!$1"/pause 700/move Scarlett 0 0 0 true/pause 150/move Scarlett 0 0 3 true/pause 300/move Scarlett -8 0 3 true/pause 600/faceDirection farmer 3 true/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000 true/halt/warp Scarlett -300 -300/viewport 41 40 true/pause 2500/speak Sophia "Hey...$2"/pause 1000/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 850/faceDirection Sophia 2 true/pause 600/showFrame Sophia 32/pause 800/speak Sophia "D-did you hear anything we were talking about?...$2"/pause 1200/question fork1 "#No. I heard nothing.#Something about medicine?"/fork 8185290_Medicine/pause 1000/speak Sophia "...$2#$b#If you did, please keep it to yourself.$2"/pause 1800/speak Sophia "Um. I'm gonna go...$2"/pause 800/showFrame Sophia 0/pause 250/move Sophia 0 0 3/pause 200/move Sophia -11 0 3 true/pause 850/faceDirection farmer 3 true/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/message "Sophia walked back home without saying a word."/pause 1000/friendship Sophia 50/end dialogue Sophia "H-hey. S-sorry about earlier. I just... have a lot of feelings.$2#$e#Um. So you met Scarlett. She doesn't visit often, we usually call each other or text.$0"

Entries.8185294_Wait: pause 100/warp Sophia 17 16/warp farmer 17 26/faceDirection Sophia 2 true/pause 100/faceDirection farmer 2 true/pause 100/speed Sophia 2/showFrame farmer 96 true/pause 100/move Sophia 0 7 2 true/viewport 17 25 true/pause 800/speak Sophia "W-wait!$6"/pause 600/showFrame farmer 0/pause 600/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 200/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 700/showFrame Sophia 32/pause 1000/speak Sophia "W-why are you here?$6"/pause 1000/emote farmer 40/pause 650/speak Sophia "Y-you were worried about me?...$6"/pause 1300/shake Sophia 700/pause 700/showFrame Sophia 33/pause 1300/speak Sophia "Um...$12"/pause 1000/showFrame Sophia 32/pause 1000/speak Sophia "L-look...$6#$b#You don't need to worry...$6#$b#Th-this is just um...$12"/pause 800/shake Sophia 800/pause 70/textAboveHead Sophia "*sniff*..."/pause 2250/speak Sophia "Th-this is just something I live with.$10#$b#I-it used to be worse before I started taking medication...$12"/pause 450/shake Sophia 800/textAboveHead Sophia "*sniff*..."/pause 1850/faceDirection Sophia 0 0 1 true/pause 250/faceDirection Sophia 0 true/pause 1200/shake Sophia 800/pause 1150/speak Sophia "Um...$6#$b#I-I'm sorry you have to see me like this...$12"/pause 1350/question fork0 "#I understand this is difficult. I'm here for you.#You'll get over this soon!"/fork 8185294_HereForYou/friendship Sophia -750/pause 500/stopMusic/pause 1000/shake Sophia 1000/emote Sophia 12/pause 300/speak Sophia "Please leave.$10"/pause 1500/emote farmer 60 true/pause 200/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end dialogue Sophia "Thanks for checking on me, but I don't appreciate what you said.$3#$b#What I have... it isn't something you can just 'get over'...$2#$e#You really hurt my feelings...$6#$e#%Sophia doesn't want to talk..."
